title: Newlywed Life With My Sweet, Sadistic King
alternative_title: ドSな俺様ダーリンとエロキュン新婚生活
status: ドSな俺様ダーリンとエロキュン新婚生活
description:
Description :
        "We just got married!"The pair of lovebirds Saya and Tatsuya are finally getting hitched! However, that doesn't mean the end of their troubles. While the ever- enthusiastic Saya is on cloud nine and determined to have the ideal married life she has long dreamed of, her husband appears to be nonchalant about it. With the difference in their attitudes, is getting married really the right decision for them?
